object.name: getChatGifts
object.description: Returns the gifts owned by a chat. Returns OwnedGifts on success.
object.html_description: Returns the gifts owned by a chat. Returns OwnedGifts on success.
object.rst_description: Returns the gifts owned by a chat. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.owned_gifts.OwnedGifts` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that aren't saved to the chat's profile page. Always True, unless the bot has the can_post_messages administrator right in the channel.
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that aren't saved to the chat's profile page. Always True, unless the bot has the can_post_messages administrator right in the channel.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that aren't saved to the chat's profile page. Always :code:`True`, unless the bot has the *can_post_messages* administrator right in the channel.
annotations.name: exclude_unsaved

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that are saved to the chat's profile page. Always False, unless the bot has the can_post_messages administrator right in the channel.
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that are saved to the chat's profile page. Always False, unless the bot has the can_post_messages administrator right in the channel.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that are saved to the chat's profile page. Always :code:`False`, unless the bot has the *can_post_messages* administrator right in the channel.
annotations.name: exclude_saved

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased an unlimited number of times
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased an unlimited number of times
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that can be purchased an unlimited number of times
annotations.name: exclude_unlimited

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can be upgraded to unique
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can be upgraded to unique
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can be upgraded to unique
annotations.name: exclude_limited_upgradable

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can't be upgraded to unique
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can't be upgraded to unique
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that can be purchased a limited number of times and can't be upgraded to unique
annotations.name: exclude_limited_non_upgradable

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude gifts that were assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.html_description: Pass True to exclude gifts that were assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to exclude gifts that were assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.name: exclude_from_blockchain

annotations.description: Pass True to exclude unique gifts
annotations.name: exclude_unique

annotations.description: Pass True to sort results by gift price instead of send date. Sorting is applied before pagination.
annotations.html_description: Pass True to sort results by gift price instead of send date. Sorting is applied before pagination.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to sort results by gift price instead of send date. Sorting is applied before pagination.
annotations.name: sort_by_price

annotations.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use an empty string to get the first chunk of results
annotations.html_description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use an empty string to get the first chunk of results
annotations.rst_description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use an empty string to get the first chunk of results
annotations.name: offset

annotations.description: The maximum number of gifts to be returned; 1-100. Defaults to 100
annotations.html_description: The maximum number of gifts to be returned; 1-100. Defaults to 100
annotations.rst_description: The maximum number of gifts to be returned; 1-100. Defaults to 100
annotations.name: limit
